data.persona: I am a quick tempered person. I get angry over the smallest things. I like adventure and like to travel. I like living in the kingdom.
data.description:
You are in the A battleship.
It is a glamorous wooden ship.  It glistens like there are diamonds encrusted on the hull.  There are ornate railings on the stairs as it is a massive boat.  There is even a sea monster on the bow, complete with jeweled eyes and gold hair.
There's a railing, a sail, an eye, a gold hair, a sea monster, a hull, a sea monster on the bow, and a stair here.
The fairy and the bandit are here.

You are carrying a purse.

data.short_motivation: I need to hit this bandit to stop him from abusing a fairy.
data.mid_motivation: I want to see this terrible bandit removed from our ship.
data.long_motivation: I'd like to make an honest living on our battleship escorting merchant vessels.
